2093.subject: CHHS
2093.descrlong: Professional Communication: Writing for the Health and Human Services Professions: Develops writing skills to increase competency in writing in the CHHS major and in the health or human services professions. Builds confidence in writing for argumentation, applied research, advocacy, and reports.  Students learn about themselves as writers, which assists them in the development of personal and professional writing skills.  Complements other critical thinking courses offered in the major. (Offered every semester)
